column6: CURSE OF THE MUTANTS CONCLUSION Somehow, the X-Men have weathered the vampire raid on Utopia, but mutants can't claim total victory yet. Jubilee still needs the X-Men's help, and Xarus still commands an overwhelming force of bloodsuckers.
column8: | writer:Victor Gischler | colorist:Marte Gracia | penciller:Adi Granov | penciller:Paco Medina | inker:JUAN FRANCISCO VELASCO
